content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TR Account is a global cross-cultural account, and all of us have teammates, colleagues, and clients from various locations whose cultural backgrounds may hugely differ from ours. Such diversity is a great benefit, as it invites creativity and new perspectives into collaboration. But it can also be a challenge, as it requires being aware of the cultural differences and the ways they influence our day-to-day communication.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here are some key DO’s and DON’Ts that are important to remember and
